results.definition: a written communication in a second language having the same meaning as the written communication in a first language
the act of changing in form or shape or appearance
examples: a photograph is a translation of a scene onto a two-dimensional surface

results.definition: (genetics) the process whereby genetic information coded in messenger RNA directs the formation of a specific protein at a ribosome in the cytoplasm
(mathematics) a transformation in which the origin of the coordinate system is moved to another position but the direction of each axis remains the same
rewording something in less technical terminology
